item.title: Daniel Zovatto, Bill Pullman, Shiloh Fernandez Join Paul Schrader’s ‘Basics of Philosophy’ (Exclusive)
item.description: Dana Delany and Karl Glusman will also appear in the recently wrapped feature that stars Jack Huston and Sofia Boutella.
